## Flags.Shorten type

Keep the first Bound.length types in A (or all if less). Using an array for the bound just makes the type easier since there is no arithmetic on the `number` type. This effectively treats Bound as a unary number.

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Shorten<T, A extends ReadonlyArray<T>, Bound extends ReadonlyArray<any>> = A extends [infer AHead, ...infer ATail extends ReadonlyArray<T>] ? Bound extends [any, ...infer BTail extends ReadonlyArray<any>] ? [AHead, ...Shorten<T, ATail, BTail>] : [] : [];
```
